last_episode_to_air.name: The Stand Off
last_episode_to_air.overview: Johnson clashes with the city council over the budget as crime stats head in the wrong direction. Balasko and Frost ponder their future together.

name: Flint Town
overview: Over a two-year period, filmmakers embedded with cops in Flint, Michigan, reveal a department grappling with volatile issues in untenable conditions.

episodes.name: Welcome to Flint Town
episodes.overview: As a water crisis erupts and a new mayor is sworn in, the understaffed police department faces uncertainty while struggling to protect the city.

episodes.name: Two Guns
episodes.overview: A new chief ushers in change as a presidential debate comes to town. A young cadet navigates training, while veteran Frost recalls a painful incident.

episodes.name: The Rat Pack
episodes.overview: Chief Johnson's new team targeting high-crime areas takes action, to mixed response from the community. Dion and his mother close in on graduation.

episodes.name: Death and Homicide
episodes.overview: Flint police battle with a store that's a magnet for criminal activity. Dion has his first shift on the job. The officers react to tragedy in Dallas.

episodes.name: The Numbers
episodes.overview: Flint PD copes with anti-police sentiments. The city starts a volunteer community police program. Encouraging crime statistics bring cautious optimism.

episodes.name: Devil's Night
episodes.overview: Presidential candidate Donald Trump visits Flint. As voters weigh renewing a police funding tax, Chief Johnson looks for other ways to raise revenue.

episodes.name: Two Worlds
episodes.overview: Election Day arrives. As nervous officers await the results, it's business as usual on the streets. Trump's win exposes divisions in the department.

episodes.name: The Stand Off
episodes.overview: Johnson clashes with the city council over the budget as crime stats head in the wrong direction. Balasko and Frost ponder their future together.
